Odin Battleship

Player Board

Ship Legend

C: Carrier (5 spaces)

B: Battleship (4 spaces)

D: Destroyer (3 spaces)

S: Submarine (3 spaces)

P: Patrol Boat (2 spaces)

Computer Board

How to Play

On your turn, click a cell on your opponent's grid to take your shot.

If you sink your opponent's fleet of five ships before your opponent sinks yours, you win!

Place Your Ships

Ship Placement Rules

Click to select a ship. After selecting a ship, press R to rotate the held ship. Click on an empty cell to place the ship.

Ships can be placed horizontally or vertically, but not diagonally.

Ships cannot overlap other ships and must be entirely contained within the board (i.e. no part of the ship can be hanging off the board).
